data.actual_result: Two swipe downs are required to close the settings menu
data.expected_result: One swipe down should close the settings menu like in portrait mode
data.short_description: You need to drag down twice to close the instant invite settings in landscape mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you have the Create Instant Invite permission and press the Create Instant Invite Button at the top of the channel list - Click the wheel icon right next to the invite link and switch to landscape mode - Try closing the settings menu by swiping down and notice that you need to do it twice instead of only once like in portrait mode
